mapper.update: update dealer_allocation set dealer_id = #{dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, serial_num = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_at = #{deleteAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, check_remark = #{checkRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, update_remark = #{updateRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, dealer_id, company_name, `status`, serial_num, data_type, delete_at, check_remark, update_remark from dealer_allocation where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
